text: property taxation renewable generation facilities equalization amend rsa ii to read as follows a renewable generation facility subject to a voluntary agreement to make a payment in lieu of taxes under this section shall be subject to the laws governing the utility property tax under rsa payments made pursuant to such agreement shall satisfy any tax liability relative to the renewable generation facility that otherwise exists under rsa the payment in lieu of taxes shall be equalized under rsa xiii in the same manner as other payments in lieu of taxes but shall be excluded from the tax base used to determine the statewide education property tax in accordance with rsa i a in the absence of a payment in lieu of taxes agreement the renewable generation facility shall be subject to taxation under rsa
